Posts.EditableText: I worship the userid feature. It allows nearly [i:bamb0fe7]anything[/i:bamb0fe7] to be coded. Some things may take a while, but it's usually feasible. 7H3 Sh4d0w Pr0j3kt is gonna kick @$$.
